title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
author: Maria Rossi
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil. Add spaghetti and cook according to package instructions.
While pasta cooks, heat a large pan over medium heat. Add diced pancetta and cook until crispy (5-7 minutes). Add garlic and cook for 1 minute more.
In a medium bowl, whisk together eggs, grated cheeses, and a generous amount of black pepper.
Drain spaghetti, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add hot spaghetti to the pan with pancetta. Remove from heat.
Quickly pour egg mixture over pasta, tossing vigorously. Add pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

reviews.comment: Absolutely delicious! Followed the recipe exactly and it turned out perfect.
Great recipe! Made it for date night and my partner loved it.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
author: Raj Patel
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, lemon juice, and spices for at least 2 hours.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through and slightly charred.
In a separate pan, heat oil and saut√© onions until golden brown.
Add tomato puree and cook until oil separates from the mixture.
Add cream and butter, simmer for 10 minutes.
Add grilled chicken to the sauce and cook for another 5 minutes.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve with naan or rice.

reviews.comment: Best chicken tikka masala I've ever made! Restaurant quality at home.
